column3:
Using modules, how would you export a constant calculate_income = 5 that is the default file to be exported? Write the code to export only the variable name, and also the code to import it if it is located in the same folder of the file importing it, and the file that contains it is year_calculations.js. Since with default exports we can name our imported file as we want, for the import we will use just income.
Export: [your code here...]
Import: [your code here...]
column4: Export: export default calculate_income; Import: import income from './year_calculations.js';
